duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop, maintain, and coordinate a responsive financial management program to ensure availability of resources for aviation solutions.
Translate program plans and estimates into budgets and assist in the development of strategic plans.
Assist in the development of various funding documents to support contract actions.
Participate in Integrated Product Teams (IPTs) and develop recommendations for acquisition programs.
Prepare financial briefing slides for various briefs to program office leadership and external organizations.
Prepare financial documents for interagency support between MASPO and other entities.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree with 20 years of relevant experience (Master's preferred)
